issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
In 4.1.0 after configuring the system when we try to install the load balancer image it fails:

{code}
# euca-install-load-balancer --install-default

Found tarball /usr/share/eucalyptus-service-image/eucalyptus-service-image-0.1-14.6.150106git0e74004.tgz

Bundling and uploading image to bucket: loadbalancer-v1
Error: Unable to install load balancer image due to:
Exception in thread Thread-8:
Traceback (most recent call last):

I changed the IP to the correct one and retry the upload now I get a different error on the OSG
